name: Halcyon Earrings [LIMITED EDITION]
description:
Make a classically elegant statement with these gorgeous brass plated steel, Byzantine weave earrings with vintage chandelier crystals on gold plated earwires. Absolutely perfect for the party season.

These chandelier crystals were sourced from an antique shop in London and are very limited, so only 4 pairs of these earrings will be made.

Total length from base of earwire to the end of the crystal = 7.5cm
Weight per earring = 11g

name: Christmas Ornaments
description:
Make your Christmas tree, wreath or dinner table stand out with these delicate scale petal and washer ornaments on your choice of waxed cotton cord. 

The petals are available in either plain, polished aluminium or gold toned aluminium, with 3 different cord colours available!

Priced at £8 each or a boxed set of 4 for £20 (saving £12!). If you choose the boxed set of 4, I will email you for your choice of colours.

Each ornament is approximately 5cm at the widest point.

name: Halcyon Octo [LIMITED EDITION]
description:
Make a classically elegant statement with these gorgeous brass plated steel, Byzantine weave earrings with vintage chandelier crystals on gold plated earwires. Absolutely perfect for the party season.

These chandelier crystals were sourced from an antique shop in London and are very limited, so get yours early to avoid disappointment!

Total length from base of earwire to the end of the crystal = 6.2cm 
Weight per earring = 8g

name: Ptera Collar
description:
A statement collar-necklace with a diamond shaped centrepiece made from brass plated steel split washers and stunning Guinea Fowl feathers. Fastens with a gold plated lobster clasp.

It's the perfect piece to see you through Autumn and Winter; wear it over fine knits or team it with a little black dress and wow everyone at your office party! A little piece of everyday couture for your wardrobe.

All our feathers are ethically sourced and 100% cruelty free. Feathers will vary slightly as they are all unique.

name: Ptera Scale Necklace
description:
A/W '13 Ptera Collection

The Ptera necklace is a lightweight, statement necklace featuring a centrepiece of Byzantine weave chainmail (made from brass plated steel washers), paired with an aluminium scale petal. 

The centrepiece is hung on a section of woven cotton cord. Available in a variety of colours.

name: Ptera Zilant (Guinea Fowl)
description: A/W '13 Ptera Collection The Ptera variant is a beautifully delicate, statement version of our classic Zilant earrings. Byzantine weave chainmail (made from brass plated steel washers) is paired with natural Guinea Fowl feathers for a seasonal and individual look. Also available with Black Partridge feathers. All our feathers are ethically sourced and 100% cruelty free. Feathers will vary slightly as they are all unique.

name: Ptera Necklace (Black Partridge)
description: A/W '13 Ptera Collection The Ptera necklace is a lightweight, statement necklace featuring a centrepiece of Byzantine weave chainmail (made from brass plated steel washers), paired with natural Black Partridge feathers for a seasonal and individual look. The centrepiece is hung on a section of woven cotton cord. Available in a variety of colours. Also available with Guinea Fowl feathers. Please note that all feathers are unique so will vary slightly from the images. All our feathers are ethically sourced and 100% cruelty free. Black Partridge feathers vary across the bird and you can choose between the striped or spotted type (see image 2), I will email you for your preference once the order is complete.

name: Ptera Zilant (Black Partridge)
description: A/W '13 Ptera Collection The Ptera variant is a beautifully delicate, statement version of our classic Zilant earrings. Byzantine weave chainmail (made from brass plated steel washers) is paired with natural Black Partridge feathers for a seasonal and individual look. Also available with Guinea Fowl feathers. All our feathers are ethically sourced and 100% cruelty free. Black Partridge feathers vary across the bird and you can choose between the striped or spotted type (see images). Please note that all feathers are unique so will vary slightly from the images.

name: Ptera Necklace (Guinea Fowl)
description: A/W '13 Ptera Collection The Ptera necklace is a lightweight, statement necklace featuring a centrepiece of Byzantine weave chainmail (made from brass plated steel washers), paired with natural Guinea Fowl feathers for a seasonal and individual look. The centrepiece is hung on a section of woven cotton cord. Available in a variety of colours. Also available with Black Partridge feathers. Please note that all feathers are unique so will vary slightly from the images. All our feathers are ethically sourced and 100% cruelty free.

name: Ophir Cuff (narrow)
description: A narrower version of the popular Ophir Cuff - a lovely European 4 in 1 weave chainmail cuff made from 6mm stainless steel washers with a brass plated steel washer trim. Fastens with a gold plated lobster clasp and has a 3cm adjuster chain. Small/medium - adjustable from 16.5cm - 19.5cm Medium/large - adjustable from 18cm - 21cm

name: Woven Bracelet
description:
A beautiful and delicate woven waxed cotton and brass hex nut bracelet in your choice of colours. The bracelets are colourful, lightweight and adjustable to fit most wrists. The adjuster chain is made from brass plated steel washers and fastens with a gold plated lobster clasp.

These bracelets stack up really well, so why not order a couple and brighten up your arm!

name: Ophir Cuff
description:
A lovely European 4 in 1 weave chainmail cuff made from 6mm stainless steel washers with a brass plated steel washer trim. Fastens with a gold plated lobster clasp and has a 3cm adjuster chain. The closure and adjuster chain can be seen in image 2.

Small/medium - adjustable from 16.5cm - 19.5cm

Medium/large - adjustable from 18cm - 21cm

name: Gaia Mantle
description: RRP £120, now only £85! A beautiful, wide statement necklace (as seen on BBC2's 'Paul Martin's Handmade Revolution' and displayed in the V&A Museum, London!) Made from brass plated steel washers in a traditional European 4 in 1 weave. Available in plain brass or with a stainless steel trim. Fastens with a gold plated lobster clasp. [Image 2 is © Adam Robertson, image 3 is © Robert Bedson]

name: Helix
description: A short, delicate, gently spiralling chainmail necklace. Made from brass plated steel washers. Fastens with a gold plated lobster clasp. The necklace can either be twisted to a tight spiral (as shown) or loosened off for a more relaxed look - it's up to you how you wear it! If you'd like a longer length, please contact me and we can discuss options.

name: Antipode
description: RRP £110, now only £80! A statement necklace made from a band of polished brass plated, square section rings in a traditional European 4 in 1 weave with stainless steel, 3mm link chains. Fastens with a gold plated lobster clasp. Length of chain can be altered, just contact me to arrange details.

name: Trio
description:
A bold, geometric, statement necklace featuring 3 large chainmail diamonds made from brass plated steel washers connected by polished stainless steel micro-washer chains. Fastens with a gold plated lobster clasp and has a 3cm extender chain made from brass plated steel washers.

Length of each diamond - 9cm
Width of each diamond - 5cm
Total length of 3 diamond section - approx. 15cm
Chain length from diamond section to clasp - approx. 19cm

name: Typha
description:
A striking horizontal zip necklace in navy and brass.

The zip design is hung on a gold plated chain and fastens with a gold plated lobster clasp. The 'standard' length sits just below the collar bone. If you would like a longer length, just select the 'custom' option and I will email you to sort out the details.

Approximate width of zip design = 12.5cm
Approximate height of zip design = 6cm
Length of chain from clasp to zip design = 16.5cm
Weight = 44g

name: Onyx Earrings
description: Stunning Byzantine weave earrings with a delicate cluster ring detail and aluminium scale petal. Made from brass plated or stainless steel washers on gold plated earwires.

name: Gold Zilant Earrings
description: Beautiful brass plated steel, Byzantine weave earrings with aluminium scale petals on gold plated earwires (not silver as shown).

name: Kite Earrings
description:
A stunning extra long pair of earrings featuring a diamond shape of woven brass plated steel rings, with 6 strands of two-tone chain (gold plated and antique brass tone) on gold plated earwires.

Height of diamond shape = approximately 6cm
Length of chain strands available:
Long = 10cm
Extra Long = 15cm

If you would like a different length, just choose the 'custom' option and I will contact you for details.

name: Peter Pan Collar
description: RRP £110, now only £70! A cute, statement collar-necklace made from brass plated steel split washers. Looks great with a little black dress, or with a plain tee and jeans. A little piece of everyday couture for your wardrobe. Approximate dimensions of each collar piece: 17cm long x 5cm wide. Approximate weight: 188g

name: Silver Bubble Earrings
description: Delicate and intricate bubble weave earrings in 6mm stainless steel and 3mm bright zinc plated, square section rings, on silver plated earwires.

name: Vasuki
description: A beautifully feminine ivory and brass zip necklace. It sits just below the collar bone for a delicate yet bold statement. The zip design is hung on a gold plated chain and fastens with a gold plated lobster clasp. Approximate width of zip design = 11cm Height of zip design at tallest point = 9cm Length of chain from clasp to zip design = 16.5cm Weight = 44g This necklace is made to order and may vary slightly from the image, although every effort will be made to ensure a close match.

name: Paracord Bracelet
description:
A chunky and strong unisex bracelet made from your choice of paracord. Fastens with a curved side release black buckle.

A2 grade stainless steel hex nut detailing optional for an additional £10.

Available in:
small - fits up to a 6.5" wrist
medium - fits up to a 7.5" wrist
large - fits up to an 8.5" wrist

Please note that the grey in stock is dark charcoal, not light grey as shown in the first image.

name: Gift Voucher
description:
Do you want to buy something for that special someone but don't know what to choose? Now you can grab a gift voucher (available in a range of values) and make sure that special someone gets their perfect jewellery!

Your voucher will be emailed to you with an unique code.

Can be used on any product available in the shop and has no expiry date.
